TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含用于更新对等解析程序服务查找表中的特定注册项的终结点地址的信息。

span.span: Contains the information used to update the endpoint address of a specific registration entry in the lookup table of a peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例主要用于从解析程序服务的网络客户端到该服务传递注册更新请求信息。Instances of this class are primarily used to pass registration update request information to the resolver service from a network client of that service.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Sub New ()
public: UpdateInfo();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public UpdateInfo (Guid registrationId, Guid client, string meshId, System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress address);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid registrationId, valuetype System.Guid client, string meshId, class System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress address) cil managed
Public Sub New (registrationId As Guid, client As Guid, meshId As String, address As PeerNodeAddress)
public: UpdateInfo(Guid registrationId, Guid client, System::String ^ meshId, System::ServiceModel::PeerNodeAddress ^ address);

param.name: registrationId
param.span: 指定要更新的注册项的唯一 ID 的 。

span.span: that specifies the unique ID of the registration entry to update.

param.name: client
param.span: 指定提交了已更新注册项信息的对等客户端的唯一 ID 的 。

span.span: that specifies the unique ID of the peer client that submitted the updated registration entry information.

param.name: meshId
param.span: 包含项的网络 ID 的 。

span.span: that contains the mesh ID of the entry.

param.name: address
param.span: 包含要更新的注册项的终结点地址的 。

span.span: that contains the endpoint address to update for the registration entry.

summary.span: 利用所提供的对等客户端 ID、注册 ID、对等网络 ID 和对等终结点地址初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the supplied peer client ID, registration ID, peer mesh ID, and peer endpoint address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于任何网络 ID，对等解析程序服务都可有多个项，可为每个特定对等终结点都设置一个项。A peer can have multiple entries for any mesh ID, each for a specific peer endpoint. 所有终结点项都可独立更新。Each endpoint entry is updated separately.

returns.span: 如果发送方发送的注册更新信息的正文格式正确，则为 true；否则，为 false。

span.span: True if the registration update information body is correctly-formed by the sender; false if it is not.
